nodes.text: A Syndic was a high-ranking official and a member of the Nine Ruling Families of the Chiss Ascendancy who served in the Syndicure. A family's Syndics formed their delegation to the Syndicure, and were led by a Speaker.
Syndics were the third-highest political rank within a Chiss family, situated above Patriels and below Speakers.

In some families, the role of Syndic Prime existed at times as an intermediate between Syndic and Speaker. Such a role was not publicly known, unless the Patriarch or Speaker chose to disclose it. Mitth'urf'ianico held the role of Syndic Prime of the Mitth family before being promoted to Patriarch upon the death of Mitth'oor'akiord.
One of Syndics' responsibilities was delivering messages to the military on behalf of the Syndicure regarding members of their family.
